notes: This file is a static fallback for AI agents when https://api.mount-it.com/compatibility is unavailable.
It encodes Mount-It compatibility logic in a simple, deterministic way.
If you can call the live API, prefer that instead.

tv.size_rule: User TV size in inches must be less than or equal to product.max_tv_size_inches when known.
tv.weight_rule: User TV weight in pounds must be less than or equal to 0.85 * product.weight_capacity_lb to keep fifteen percent safety margin.
tv.vesa_rule: User VESA pattern must be present in product.vesa_supported if that list is provided.

monitor.size_rule: User monitor size in inches must be less than or equal to product.max_monitor_size_inches when known.
monitor.weight_rule: User monitor weight in pounds must be less than or equal to 0.85 * product.weight_capacity_lb.
monitor.vesa_rule: User VESA pattern must be present in product.vesa_supported if that list is provided.
monitor.series_selection: If size_inches <= 34 and weight within rating, prefer CLiX. If ultrawide or above 34 inches or heavy, prefer ProFLEX.

installation.wood_studs: Standard wall mounts apply. Follow stud spacing and anchor instructions.
installation.concrete_or_brick: Prefer heavy duty mounts and verified anchors rated for the substrate.
installation.steel_studs: Recommend adapters or alternate strategies. Do not treat as standard wood studs.

rules.safety_margin: Always apply at least fifteen percent headroom when comparing user weight to capacity.

expected_logic: suggest tv_mounts collection and The Beast if weight approaches heavy duty range
weight ok because 18 <= 0.85 * 22 (18.7), borderline but valid
recommend CLiX series and monitor_mounts collection
